name: Hostile Redundancy
description: In this game you play as an office worker who is about to be made redundant as the company is closing down, however you have just been contacted by a rival company and they will instantly employ you aslong as you steal enough files from your current company. You may have the insider advantage, but watch out, other hackers will also want that valuable info. You are under a time limit aswell as its the last night before the company shuts down and the data is gone forever!
